title: Time to change/nerf Lethal Tempo
body:
Reduce the AS for ranged champs to 66% of the current value.

That's all, it looks fine for melees.

replies.body:
You could either save your cc for the proc or just dog pile them immediately so they are dead or needing to retreat by the time it activates.

Besides, promoting all that attack speed lowers adc upfront burst noticably, which I appreciate.

Honestly, it's going to need buffs/nerfs anyway.

Yasuo/Jax/Xin cannot utilize it as well as Marksman can, so either they focus on other Runes or Riot makes a difference between melee and ranged for Lethal Tempo.
They are also much more exposed to CC, being melee.

I'd agree with a possible 20-30% increase for melee champs as an alternative though.
make it give 10% attack speed to ranged that'w how u balance it
